title: Anyone know how to get Free RP?

replies.body:
There are several ways to get free RP:

1. Win Tournaments and competitions (~5,000 RP). 

2. Send a ticket to Riot Support with some Fan Art (~50 RP). 

3. Have someone gift you free RP. 

4. Steal a Credit Card (not advised). 

Hope this helps. 

Thanks :)

Other than the ways *Little Witch Eve* pointed out, you can not acquire paid currency in league (RP), without paying. 

Be wary of the many links that are going around at the moment claiming to be legit ways to get free RP through Riot, since they are scams. You can read more on how to spot a scam link [HERE](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/8GVrAi62-security-reminder-beware-of-scamsphishing-sites).
